boardgame.name: Il Principe
boardgame.description: An auction game where income and resources are automatically gained at the beginning of each turn. Then the money is used to bid on more resources, then the resources can either be used (along with money) to build cities, or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;displayed_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; to qualifying for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;roles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (like political appointments) which gain influence/VP-graft plus a special power such as income boost, resource boost, VP-boost, or resource re-display._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Building a city gains the player VP but also gives VP to the opponent(s) with matching role/graft color._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The board does triple duty, containing the scoring track, a map of some part of Italy, and staging area for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;role_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; tiles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGB Volume 4 - Session Review with Hacienda and Il Principe
Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 96 - Amyitis and Il Principe
